pageTitle: Prime Ministerâ€™s itinerary for Wednesday, November 4, 2020 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Ottawa, Ontario

Private meetings.

10:00 a.m. The Prime Minister will virtually attend the National Caucus meeting.

2:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will attend Question Period.

7:00 p.m. The Prime Minister, joined by Member of Parliament for Surrey-Newton Sukh Dhaliwal, will participate in a virtual town hall with Kwantlen Polytechnic University students, staff, and faculty members. The town hall will be livestreamed on YouTube via the following link: www.kpu.ca/townhall.
